sense.gloss: some kind of, one type of
the same, no different, (just) as if
as a test, as an experiment, by way of experiment, by way of trial, tentatively
one part, one portion, one section, some
one (esp. of two), the other, one way, the other way, one direction, the other direction, one side, the other side, one party, the other party
on the one hand, on the other hand
whereas, although, but at the same time, meanwhile, in turn
just keeps, being inclined to ..., tending to be ..., tending to do ..., continuously ..., just keeps on ...ing, only
(what) the heck, (why) in the world, (who) on earth
once, one time, on one occasion
one degree, one tone, one musical interval
more or less, though not quite satisfactorily, after a fashion, pretty much, roughly, so far as it goes
single word, a few words, brief comment
fixed, settled, constant, definite, uniform, regularized, regularised, defined, standardized, standardised, certain, prescribed
one time (in the past), a period, former times
once, at one time, formerly, before
for a time, for a while, for the time being, for the present, for the moment, temporarily
absolutely (not), (not) at all, (none) whatsoever, without exception
in one go, in one gulp, in one breath, without stopping, without pausing, without a rest, in one sitting, at a stretch
suddenly, all of a sudden, all at once
very hard, with utmost effort, as hard as one can, with all one's might, for dear life, eagerly, desperately
whole life, a lifetime, all through life, one existence, a generation, an age, the whole world, the era
(the only, the greatest, etc.) of one's life

of sorts, something of a, a sort of
identical, same, one and the same, equal

fully, to capacity, to the maximum, as much as possible
book containing a collection of poems

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓に100ユーロ↑稼↑↓かせ↓ぎます。
sdata.e: I make €100 a day.

sdata.j: それはあなたが↑一人↑↓ひとり↓になりたくないからです。
sdata.e: It's because you don't want to be alone.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓らにチケットをもう↑一↑↓いち↓↑枚↑↓まい↓↑送↑↓おく↓ってくれるように↑頼↑↓たの↓んだ。
sdata.e: I told them to send me another ticket.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑一時期↑↓いちじき↓、↑天体↑↓てんたい↓↑物理↑↓ぶつり↓↑学者↑↓がくしゃ↓になりたかった。
sdata.e: I once wanted to be an astrophysicist.

sdata.j: お↑金↑↓かね↓を↑稼↑↓かせ↓ぎたいならアメリカが↑一番↑↓いちばん↓だ。
sdata.e: America is a lovely place to be, if you are here to earn money.

sdata.j: ↑失礼↑↓しつれい↓に↑振舞↑↓ふるま↓ったりしないのが↑一番↑↓いちばん↓だと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think it is best not to be impolite.

sdata.j: ↑孤独↑↓こどく↓な↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑他人↑↓たにん↓を↑恐↑↓おそ↓れるから↑一人↑↓ひとり↓なのだ。
sdata.e: Every person who is alone is alone because they are afraid of others.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑君↑↓きみ↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑住↑↓す↓んだことは↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑人生↑↓じんせい↓↑観↑↓かん↓に↑影響↑↓えいきょう↓を↑与↑↓あた↓えたと↑思↑↓おも↓う。
sdata.e: I think my living with you has influenced your way of living.

sdata.j: ↑丸↑↓まる↓↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓オンラインで↑君↑↓きみ↓を↑見↑↓み↓ないなんてびっくりだよ。
sdata.e: It almost scared me not to see you online for a whole day.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑週間↑↓しゅうかん↓でどれほどのことが↑学↑↓まな↓べるか、↑自分↑↓じぶん↓でもびっくりするはずだよ！
sdata.e: You'd be surprised what you can learn in a week.

sdata.j: ↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑旅行↑↓りょこう↓してくれる↑人↑↓ひと↓がいないんだ。
sdata.e: I don't have anyone who'd travel with me.

sdata.j: ↑自分↑↓じぶん↓↑自身↑↓じしん↓に↑疑問↑↓ぎもん↓を↑持↑↓も↓つことは↑良識↑↓りょうしき↓の↑第一歩↑↓だいいっぽ↓だ。
sdata.e: To have doubts about oneself is the first sign of intelligence.

sdata.j: ↑買↑↓か↓い↑物↑↓もの↓に↑行↑↓い↓かなければならない。↑一↑↓いち↓↑時間↑↓じかん↓で↑戻↑↓もど↓るよ。
sdata.e: I have to go shopping. I'll be back in an hour.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓と↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑踊↑↓おど↓っていただけますか。
sdata.e: Would you like to dance with me?

sdata.j: ↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑踊↑↓おど↓りませんか。
sdata.e: Would you like to dance with me?

sdata.j: ↑一晩↑↓ひとばん↓↑泊↑↓と↓めてもらいたいんだけど。
sdata.e: I'd like to stay for one night.

sdata.j: ↑証明↑↓しょうめい↓もできないのに、↑一体↑↓いったい↓↑何↑↓なに↓を↑真実↑↓しんじつ↓だと↑信↑↓しん↓じるのだ？
sdata.e: What do you believe is true even though you cannot prove it?

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑立方↑↓りっぽう↓メートルは↑千↑↓せん↓リットルにあたる。
sdata.e: A cubic meter corresponds to 1000 liters.

sdata.j: ローマは↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓にして↑成↑↓な↓らず。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: ↑千里↑↓せんり↓の↑道↑↓みち↓も↑一↑↓いっ↓↑歩↑↓ぽ↓から。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: ↑一朝一夕↑↓いっちょういっせき↓にはできない。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: ローマは↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓にしてならず。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: ローマは、↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓にして↑建設↑↓けんせつ↓されたものではない。
sdata.e: Rome wasn't built in a day.

sdata.j: ↑一緒↑↓いっしょ↓に↑暮↑↓く↓らせる↑誰↑↓だれ↓かと↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓するのではなく、その↑人↑↓ひと↓なしでは↑生↑↓い↓きていけない↑人↑↓ひと↓と↑結婚↑↓けっこん↓するのよ。
sdata.e: You don't marry someone you can live with — you marry the person whom you cannot live without.

sdata.j: もし↑二人↑↓ふたり↓の↑人↑↓ひと↓が↑常↑↓つね↓に↑同↑↓おな↓じ↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑持↑↓も↓っていたら、そのうちの↑一↑↓ひと↓↑人↑↓り↓は↑必要↑↓ひつよう↓ない。
sdata.e: If two men always have the same opinion, one of them is unnecessary.

sdata.j: ↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓に↑何↑↓なん↓↑回↑↓かい↓↑鏡↑↓かがみ↓で↑自分↑↓じぶん↓を↑見↑↓み↓ているの？
sdata.e: How many times a day do you look at yourself in the mirror?

sdata.j: ↑世界↑↓せかい↓の↑人々↑↓ひとびと↓は↑常↑↓つね↓により↑一↑↓いっ↓↑層↑↓そう↓の↑自由↑↓じゆう↓と↑平等↑↓びょうどう↓を↑主張↑↓しゅちょう↓している。
sdata.e: People in the world are always advocating for more freedom and equality.

sdata.j: ↑冬↑↓ふゆ↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑好↑↓す↓きな↑季節↑↓きせつ↓です。
sdata.e: Winter is my favorite season.

sdata.j: ↑夢↑↓ゆめ↓を↑実現↑↓じつげん↓するのに↑一番↑↓いちばん↓↑良↑↓よ↓いのは↑目↑↓め↓を↑覚↑↓さ↓ますことである。
sdata.e: The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.

sdata.j: そこに↑一↑↓いち↓↑日↑↓にち↓↑中↑↓じゅう↓ただ↑立↑↓た↓っているつもりかい？
sdata.e: Are you just going to stand there all day?
